twoSetSkill.name: Special Relativity 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Gain 5% Total DMG Multiplier for every meter of distance from the enemy. Bonus stacks up to 5 times.

threeSetSkill.name: General Relativity 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Get Total DMG Reduction when closer to the enemy, up to a max of 40% DMG Reduction.
